org.drip.quant.distribution

Class UnivariateNormal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.quant.distribution.Univariate
      • org.drip.quant.distribution.UnivariateNormal

  • public class UnivariateNormal
extends Univariate
    UnivariateNormal implements the univariate normal distribution. It implements incremental, cumulative, and inverse cumulative distribution densities.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnivariateNormal(double dblMean, double dblVariance)
      Construct a univariate Gaussian/normal distribution

    • Method Summary

      Generate a N (0, 1) distribution
      double incremental(double dblXLeft, double dblXRight)
      Compute the incremental under the distribution between the 2 variates
      double invCumulative(double dblX)
      Compute the inverse cumulative under the distribution corresponding to the given value
      static void main(java.lang.String[] astrArgs)
